website_summaries.verdict: It's the flavor that really makes these Lay's a top choice.
pros: Tastes like onion dip on a potato chip
Usually arrives with most chips in good shape
You may find yourself eating the whole bag
cons: This flavor can seem quite salty

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t mind the crush these are good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of these and they were fresh enough but they did crush. When the pieces got too small too eat individually I sprinkled them on a salad in place of croutons. That was a good idea. If you don’t mind the crush, you can order these but I personally prefer to buy at the supermarket. Less breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality potato chips. I was very pleased with them overall and in every way. I loved the taste or the flavor very much. I will buy this flavor again and again. They didn't disappoint in anyway or at anytime. I'm glad I got to try these chips, by this company, in this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless ---
customer_reviews.text: --- kind of like a plain Pringle...used to like...don't trust anymore...flushed the whole bag. They were also disgusting on the digestive system this first and last time.
customer_reviews.author: Dual

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Sour Cream & Onion... The Party size is a better offer.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Party size sour cream and onion chips!
customer_reviews.text: Lay's has great chips and great flavors and I love when I can get a giant bag of one of my favorite flavors, sour cream and onion, for as much as I would get for one at the store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Chips
customer_reviews.text: Lays Sour Cream & Onion are the only potato chips I eat. They taste wonderful and are addictive. Have to pour a portion in a small bowl to ration use. One of my most loved guilty pleasures.
customer_reviews.author: Glorym

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Chips we’re smashed cheezits were on top f the chips
customer_reviews.author: crissy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips, but it seems like the bag got smaller. Not sure if it's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: All Crumbs Upon Opening Bag
customer_reviews.text: Was all crumbs when we opened the bag. Shipping issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: They were not all broken and tast was good... this time they were smashed up. No big chips.. all
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Chips was already open
customer_reviews.text: I really can't tell you about the freshness bad came open in the Box unable to eat
customer_reviews.author: CarolynO.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is exactly what the chips are called.
customer_reviews.text: These chips taste just like you had put your chip in a dish of sour cream & onions. They are wonderful. Personally, I can’t stand anything with sea salt on it.
customer_reviews.author: RHoda

customer_reviews.title: So Tasty - good chips for a sandwich
customer_reviews.text: These chips are just right to go with a sandwich. I like the Sour Cream and Onion Flavor. These are just good chips.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: even tho pkg was open my social worker said it ...
customer_reviews.text: even tho pkg was open my social worker said it was still ok for me to eat pkg may have gotten open when I cut box to open pkg
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA

customer_reviews.title: I love these potato chips
customer_reviews.text: I love these potato chips. The bag size is a great value for the price. I will continue to frequently buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great side item
customer_reviews.text: Side with sandwiches, pizza, burgers, your favorite food. Snacking is best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too salty, but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Bulk size. Very salty though. Used to have more flavor though.
customer_reviews.author: OmniNegro

customer_reviews.title: Potato chips
customer_reviews.text: Taste just like the same stuff you buy in the stores.🙄
customer_reviews.author: Edward P. Seitler Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It lives up to all it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best chips in the best flavor you can get without a prescription!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Del Rey fan

customer_reviews.title: Chips damaged and poorly packed.
customer_reviews.text: bag of chips packed with drinks that were heavy (dduuuhhh). Bag broken and chips all over box!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: There were heavy things in the box with the chips ...
customer_reviews.text: There were heavy things in the box with the chips and the bags were smushed open, chips everywhere and stale.
customer_reviews.author: Enjenn64

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Have always been a favorite. The larger size is great at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Barely any sour cream and onion flavor but the potato chips and fresh and crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn demarchi

customer_reviews.title: Bag of chips was already open upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these chips but the bag was open upon arrival. We are assuming that it opened by the pressure on it from being in the middle of the box or someone had a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Teague

product_meta.title: Lay's Sour Cream & Onion Potato Chips, Party Size! (14.75 Ounce)
product_meta.description:
Wherever celebrations and good times happen, the lay's brand will be there just as it has been for more than 75 years. With flavors almost as rich as our history, we have a potato chip or crisp flavor guaranteed to bring a smile on your face.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Frito-Lay Canada, P.O. BOX 40, Cambridge, N1R5S9




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :12.99 x 8.7 x 4.09 inches; 1.05 Pounds
 * Date First Available :November 8, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Frito-Lay Pantry
 * ASIN :B01MS8BDSV

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars311 ratings Wherever celebrations and good times happen, the lay's brand will be there just as it has been for more than 75 years. With flavors almost as rich as our history, we have a potato chip or crisp flavor guaranteed to bring a smile on your face.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Frito-Lay Canada, P.O. BOX 40, Cambridge, N1R5S9
feature_bullets: 14.75 Oz. Bag of lay's sour cream and onion flavored potato chips
Tasty sour cream and onion flavor
Share this bag with the whole family for a fun snack
Pair with your favorite Frito-Lay dip
